description: An HTML file containing embedded JavaScript code that defines a Calculator service class extending a Service base class, registers methods, and initializes a service manager for remote communication.

classes.name: Calculator
classes.description: A class extending Service that provides 'add' and 'sub' methods and registers them for remote invocation.

methods.name: add
methods.description: Calculates the sum of an array of numbers asynchronously.

methods.name: sub
methods.description: Calculates the difference between two numbers asynchronously.
